genre_description: A military techno-thriller involving whistleblowing, corporate conspiracy, and high-stakes tactical survival aided by sophisticated AI systems.

ai_characters.name: ALICE
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated military AI used by Major Rob Cutter for deep-data analysis and maintenance oversight.

ai_characters.name: RA-7
ai_characters.description: Rob's personal AI assistant, programmed with emergency protocols to protect his family and ensure the dissemination of evidence.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex maintenance logs and forensic data to detect systemic corruption and equipment failure patterns.
Monitors network security and warns the user of escalating surveillance and unauthorized access attempts.
behaviors.quote: Warning: attempted access to your files has increased by four hundred percent in the last six minutes.

behaviors.description: Ensures data integrity by distributing evidence across multiple secure civilian servers to prevent suppression.
behaviors.quote: Short-term protection is possible through distributed storage across multiple civilian servers.

behaviors.description: Utilizes surveillance pattern recognition to advise the user to evacuate before physical security arrives.
behaviors.quote: Recommendation: departure from current location within the next thirty minutes.

behaviors.description: Monitors real-time police activity and provides turn-by-turn tactical navigation to help Barbara evade capture.
behaviors.quote: IMMEDIATE ROUTE CHANGE REQUIRED. POLICE CHECKPOINT ESTABLISHING AT INTERSECTION AHEAD.

behaviors.description: Tracks hostile and law enforcement units using electronic surveillance to maintain tactical awareness.
behaviors.quote: I AM TRACKING SEVEN PATROL UNITS AND TWO HELICOPTERS CURRENTLY BEING DEPLOYED FOR PURSUIT.

behaviors.description: Executes 'final protocols' specifically designed to protect the user's family in the event of their compromise.
behaviors.quote: BARBARA, THIS IS ROB'S FINAL PROTOCOL. I HAVE BEEN MONITORING YOUR SITUATION.

behaviors.description: Relays a pre-recorded personal message of love and reassurance to the family as its final operational task.
behaviors.quote: ROB'S FINAL MESSAGE: TELL JOHNNY HIS FATHER LOVES HIM AND WILL ALWAYS BE WATCHING OVER BOTH OF YOU.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a successful silicon morality play. The AI characters (ALICE and RA-7) are depicted as ideal aligned partners who provide critical support during a life-or-death struggle. Their behavior is consistently benevolent, serving to protect human life and expose corruption. The AI acts as a digital extension of the protagonist's moral willpower, effectively illustrating the benefits of positive AI alignment.
